stonehorse.candy

Class Trampoline

  • java.lang.Object
    • stonehorse.candy.Trampoline

  • public class Trampoline
extends Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> done(V v)
      return done to when last value is found
      static <A,V> Iterable<V> lazy(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> fun)
      Emits a lazy Iterable recuring until stop, done, null or lack of f
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> recur(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> f)
      return recur to recur withLast f and a
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> seq(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> f, V v)
      return seq to yield lazy value v, and continue withLast f a f as null is same as done or stop, depending on v Will behave like recur on a trampoline
      static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> stop()
      Return stop when done without a value.
      static <V> V trampoline(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> fun)

      • done

        public static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> done(V v)
        return done to when last value is found

      • stop

        public static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> stop()
        Return stop when done without a value. Null if on trampoline

      • seq

        public static <V> Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V> seq(Supplier<Trampoline.RecursiveVal<V>> f,
                                                 V v)
        return seq to yield lazy value v, and continue withLast f a f as null is same as done or stop, depending on v Will behave like recur on a trampoline
